channel.title: CVE Feed for Satrya -- Smart Recent Posts Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Satrya -- Smart Recent Posts Widget

item.title: CVE-2024-33692|2024-08-02T02:36:04.540Z -- satrya -- smart%20recent%20posts%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Satrya Smart Recent Posts Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Smart Recent Posts Widget: from n/a through 1.0.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-33692|2024-06-04T17:43:47.489Z -- satrya -- smart%20recent%20posts%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Satrya Smart Recent Posts Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Smart Recent Posts Widget: from n/a through 1.0.3.
